name: myTamarin
description:
myTamarin Childcare Matchmaker is grounded in psychology, powered by technology and fueled by our team’s dedication & hard work. 

We use a ground-breaking approach to match parents and child carers based not only on skill-set, but also on unique personality traits, parenting style, preferences, values and beliefs. Personality matching for childcare has never been used before, but it is extremely important because of the intimate nature of the job.

team.name: Zarja Cibej
team.bioHtml: Founder & CEO of myTamarin - the new era childcare business. Strong business acumen (BCG, Wharton MBA). Competitive skier. Can’t resist a good challenge.

jobs.title: Head of Growth / Marketing at a Techstars-backed company
jobs.description:
If you’re keen to build a growth function for an award-winning and Techstars-backed startup, from scratch, keep reading.

*Who are myTamarin?*

We are a young, dynamic, and fast-growing startup, backed by Innovate UK, some of the best angels from the UK and the US, and the Techstars London 2019 programme. Our founder is an ex-BCG and Wharton MBA graduate, and we have a super friendly team.

We are set to revolutionise the childcare market, in the UK and beyond.

We are looking for sharp and ambitious individuals to join our fast-growing business.

*Why are we in business?*

Childcare is a dated, technology-starved and generally undeserved market, and therefore a major pain for many parents. By solving childcare, we are at the forefront of enabling diversity at workplace - because no parent can go back to work comfortably, if they are don't have childcare sorted.

Our matching of parents to nannies is grounded in psychology and powered by technology. We’re sourcing the best nannies, and automating parts of the matching process with the most innovative AI and block-chain technology solutions. We’ve been called the match.com of childcare!

*What will you do?*

This is an incredibly unique opportunity to build our growth function, and the team from the grounds up, in a startup that is de-risked by traction and investment. Initially, you will have to work as a team of one, supported of course, by the rest of the team and working alongside the founder. Since we're a marketplace, you will be getting us in front of the right parents, and you will be attracting the best nannies in town.

You will have the freedom, and the responsibility to develop our marketing strategy, and be in charge of its execution. This includes brand, product marketing, digital, SEO, content, and email marketing. You will define that further. You will be both creative and analytical at the same time.

*What’s in it for you?*

* A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to revolutionise the last service industry yet to be disrupted by tech – childcare
* A unique opportunity to put your best skills at work, and build the best marketing function to set us up for sustainable growth
* Join the Techstars programme, and network
* Excellent central location in vibrant and trendy Old Street
* Significant stock options available as well as senior exec / co-founder roles as a next step

If this role sounds like your ideal next step, we expect the following of you (not everything is mandatory, and your attitude is more important than your skills):
* Ideally have marketplace experience (i.e. you know all about liquidity hacking - and can keep growing both demand and supply in balance)
* Ideally have startup experience (i.e. have seen at least one startup go from little to big)
* You thrive on challenge and can work with ambiguity
* You are a self-starter and a problem-solver. You see it, you crack it, you move on
* Love numbers – both as data to analyse and as targets to exceed
* You have a creative mind and can think out of the box; in other words, Google search and social media are not key to your marketing strategy
* Have a friendly personality

You can read more about what others are saying about us "here":https://realbusiness.co.uk/mytamarin-match-com-childcare-parents/

jobs.title: Head of Operations at a Techstars-backed company
jobs.description:
Do you want to join an award-winning and Techstars-backed startup? Do you want to be at the heart of our business and be in charge of our day-to-day operations? Is so, keep reading.

*Who are myTamarin?*

We are a young, dynamic, and fast-growing startup, backed by Innovate UK, some of the best angels from the UK and the US, and the Techstars London 2019 programme. Our founder is an ex-BCG and Wharton MBA graduate, and we have a super friendly team.

We are set to revolutionise the childcare market, in the UK and beyond.

We are looking for sharp and ambitious individuals to join our fast-growing business.

*Why are we in business?*

Childcare is a dated, technology-starved and generally undeserved market, and therefore a major pain for many parents. By solving childcare, we are at the forefront of enabling diversity at workplace - because no parent can go back to work comfortably, if they are don't have childcare sorted.

Our matching of parents to nannies is grounded in psychology and powered by technology. We’re sourcing the best nannies, and automating parts of the matching process with the most innovative AI and block-chain technology solutions. We’ve been called the match.com of childcare!

*What will you do?*

You will be at the heart of our business, where the magic happens - you will be responsible for the smooth operations of matching parents and nannies. You will continuously improve our processes and our product to deliver the best childcare experience for our parents, our nannies, and our team.

You will hire, train and manage matchmakers, talent advocates and customer service team. You will work closely with the marketing team to keep beating our targets.

This is an incredibly unique opportunity to build a business practically from the grounds up, in a startup that is de-risked by traction and investment. You will work alongside the founder.

*What’s in it for you?*

* A once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to revolutionise the last service industry yet to be disrupted by tech – childcare
* A unique opportunity to put your best skills at work, and build the best operations to set us up for sustainable growth
* Join the Techstars programme, and network
* Excellent central location in vibrant and trendy Old Street
* Significant stock options available as well as senior exec / co-founder roles as a next step

If this role sounds like your ideal next step, we expect the following of you (not everything is mandatory, and your attitude is more important than your skills):
* You have operational experience and you don't mind getting your hands dirty; no work is beneath you and you get s**t done
* You have startup experience (i.e. have seen at least one startup go from little to big) or have worked in a fast-moving organisation
* Have recruitment, sales, hospitality or customer service experience
* You thrive on challenge and can work with ambiguity
* You are a self-starter and a problem-solver. You see it, you crack it, you move on
* Love numbers – both as data to analyse and as targets to exceed
* Have a friendly personality

You can read more about what others are saying about us "here":https://realbusiness.co.uk/mytamarin-match-com-childcare-parents/

jobs.title: Customer Success Agent
jobs.description:
*Who are myTamarin?*
 
We are a young, dynamic, and fast-growing startup, backed and recognised by Innovate UK as one of the best UK startups in 2018. Our founder is an ex-BCG senior Principal and Wharton MBA graduate. We are set to revolutionise the childcare market, in the UK and beyond.
 
We are looking for sharp and ambitious individuals to join our award-winning business.
 
*What is our mission?*
 
Childcare is a major pain, as every parent knows it! But we're here to solve it. Our matching of parents to nannies is grounded in psychology and powered by technology. We're sourcing the best nannies, and automating parts of the matching process with the most innovative AI and blockchain technology solutions. We've been called the match.com of childcare!
 
*What might a day in your role look like?*
 
- Sourcing and interviewing potential nannies through video calls, ensuring they meet the company standards
- Speaking with parents who sign up to the platform to understand exactly what they are looking for in a nanny placement 
- Communicating with parents and nannies throughout the day to help find the perfect match
- Delivering excellent customer service when dealing with any parent or nanny issues
- Thinking hard about how to improve and automate our processes and working with the team to come up with the best solutions. 
- Like with any other startup, you’ll be expected to wear multiple hats and will be exposed to all other parts of the business.

*The ideal candidate’s personality and qualifications*
 
- Degree educated
- Highly customer-focused
- Delights in exceeding customer expectations
- A problem-solver. As a young company, opportunities to change and fix things happen all the time, we expect you to create new processes, make suggestions, and build improvements with us
- Has great time management skills. You’ll be spinning many plates at once, so excellent time management is essential to keep your clients and candidates happy!
- Loves numbers – both as data to analyse and as targets to exceed
- Has high attention to detail and very organised
- Oozes confidence, we can teach you sales techniques but you need to be comfortable in picking up the phone to speak with parents and nannies
- A good communicator. You’re able to write clearly, simply and accurately. Excellent English is a must!
- Looking for a fast-paced and dynamic role. As the business grows your role might not look the same from one week to the next. 
- Has a friendly personality and must be a team player
 
*What are the perks of working for myTamarin?*
 
You have an opportunity to be part of the team set to revolutionise the last service industry yet to be disrupted by tech – childcare. 
 
Work for a female-founded tech start-up 
 
Massive learning opportunity – You’ll be joining a company  right at the very beginning of its journey and can play a key role in shaping it for the future
 
Excellent central location in the heart of Camden 
 
Be part of the Techstars program and network
 
A competitive starting salary (up to £23K + bonus depending on experience and performance) plus potential to gain ownership in the company/earn commission/bonuses.
 
You can read more about what others are saying about us here:https://realbusiness.co.uk/funding/2018/07/02/mytamarin-match-com-childcare-parents/.

jobs.title: Junior Product Manager
jobs.description:
*Hi! If you're a curious problem solver who's up for a good challenge, keep reading.*
 
*Who are myTamarin?*
 
We are a young, dynamic, and fast-growing startup, backed and recognised by Innovate UK as one of the best UK startups in 2018. Our founder is an ex-BCG senior Principal and Wharton MBA graduate. We are set to revolutionise the childcare market, in the UK and beyond.
 
We are looking for sharp and ambitious individuals to join our award-winning business.
 
*What is our mission?*
 
Childcare is a major pain, as every parent knows it! But we're here to solve it. Our matching of parents to nannies is grounded in psychology and powered by technology. We're sourcing the best nannies, and automating parts of the matching process with the most innovative AI and blockchain technology solutions. We've been called the match.com of childcare!
 
*What might a day in your role look like?*
 
Working with our founder on new features and working with our development team to get them across the line on time
Talking to parents and nannies, finding out their needs and making sure our product is always simple and easy to understand
Communicating effectively with developers to understand constraints, tradeoffs and capabilities
Designing and measuring tests and other experiments that test our hypotheses about what the right way forward is
Using data to inform decisions, set goals and measure the impact of the work we ship
Collaborating with other teams to scope and prioritise new product opportunities
 
 
*The ideal candidate’s personality and qualifications…*
 
Degree educated
A problem-solver. As a young company, opportunities to change and fix things happen all the time, we expect you to create new processes, make suggestions, and build improvements with us
You’ll be spinning many plates at once, so excellent time management is essential
Loves numbers – both as data to analyse and as targets to exceed
Has high attention to detail and very organised
A self-starter looking for a fast-paced and dynamic role. As the business grows your role might not look the same from one week to the next. 
Has a friendly personality and must be a team player who is excited to help out with the wider business and teams
 
*Bonus points if you:*
 
Know HTML, CSS, Python, SQL or any other programming language
Have worked with design and prototyping tools like Sketch, Zeplin, Invision or similar
Have a reasonable understanding of tools like Google Analytics, JIRA, Excel, etc.
 
*What are the perks of working for myTamarin?*
 
You have an opportunity to be part of the team set to revolutionise the last service industry yet to be disrupted by tech – childcare. 
 
Massive learning opportunity – You’ll be joining a company  right at the very beginning of its journey and can play a key role in shaping it for the future
 
Excellent central location in the heart of Camden 
 
Be part of the Techstars program and network
 
A competitive starting salary
 
You can read more about what others are saying about us here:https://realbusiness.co.uk/funding/2018/07/02/mytamarin-match-com-childcare-parents/.
